attributes.action: demand an apology for the stupid bullying act of 3 British on an old trishaw driver in Singapore
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Sir,

We demand an international official apology or statement from the government of UK for the stupid bullying act of 3 British on an old rickshaw driver in Singapore.

Details can be found in YouTube with a search for "Bastards bully Singapore Senior Citizen"

The act is a show of bully, insensitivity, poor respect to the elderly and is definitely not funny at all to anyone anywhere in the world.

We hope an official apology/statement from the UK government will alert all British and people from all over the whole world to be more sensitive and respectful to all elderly and human rights within the British society and in the whole world.

We believe you and your office has the capability to lead the whole world towards a more gracious society.

Thank you.
